attributes.action: To launch a full open Public Enquiry into the UK MP's Expenses Claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sign here if you wish to petition Prime Minister Gordon Brown to launch a full public enquiry into the MP’s expenses fiasco.
At a time when the world faces a global recession; Armed Services fighting over seas are without proper resources to complete their task; Public Sector workers are told to accept low salary increases and the Government explaining that there is no money in the pot the media discover MP’s have claimed expenses for extraordinary items and services. 
ONLY due to this media coverage and pressure by the PM have some MP’s paid these extraordinary expenses back into the public purse. I wonder what would have happened if the media coverage and PM’s pressure had not evolved at all?
To restore the UK’s faith in the democratic political system in the UK I ask you to sign this petition to ensure that this astonishing situation does not repeat itself in the future and restore faith in the political system in the UK.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
